Subject: Red Hot Ice Pop
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He stood back, waiting to see if his shots on Unitron and Speed Viper
would hit. He never saw Gemeni Dragon's freeze beam. It struck Hot Rod,
and a shell of ice formed around him. He could not move. But he could
still think. He activated his optic laser to burn through the ice.
